about.title: About Outliers Academy
about.description: We are a company specialized in design, software development and artificial intelligence. We design your brand, grow your online presence, increase your sales and optimize your processes with software and artificial intelligence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Transform businesses through technological innovation, combining exceptional design with cutting-edge software development and artificial intelligence to create solutions that generate real and lasting impact.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading company in comprehensive technological solutions, recognized for our ability to innovate and for helping companies reach their maximum potential through digital transformation and artificial intelligence.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the professionals who make your business digital transformation possible.

services.webMarketingDesc: Power your online presence and convert visits into sales with integrated web solutions and marketing strategies.
services.customSystemsDesc: Transform your company by increasing the efficiency and control of your processes with customized systems.
services.aiAutomationDesc: Increase productivity and improve customer experience with AI agents and intelligent automation.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our courses, platform, and services.

general.title: General Questions
general.description: Basic information about our courses and platform

enrollment.question: How can I enroll in a course?
enrollment.answer: You can enroll directly from each course page. You just need to create an account and proceed with payment through our secure system.

certificate.question: Do courses include a certificate?
certificate.answer: Yes, all our courses include a completion certificate that you can download once you have completed all the content and exercises.

devices.question: Can I access content from any device?
devices.answer: Absolutely. Our platform is optimized to work on computers, tablets and mobile devices, so you can learn from wherever you want.

support.question: Is technical support available?
support.answer: Yes, we have a technical support team available to help you with any technical issues you may experience on the platform.

platform.question: What browsers are supported?
platform.answer: Our platform works best with Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser.

browser.question: Can I use the platform offline?
browser.answer: Currently, our platform requires an internet connection to access course content and track your progress.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Payment methods, refunds, and billing questions

expiration.question: Do courses have an expiration date?
expiration.answer: No, once you purchase a course, you have lifetime access to the content, including future updates.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with your course, you can request a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.

cta.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

cookies.title: We use cookies to enhance your experience
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our services and to personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Customize your cookie preferences. You can change these settings at any time.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Enable the website to remember information that changes how it behaves or looks, like your preferred language or region.

pricing.title: Plans designed for your growth
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your goal. Cancel anytime, upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect to start your journey in AI and Automation

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For professionals looking to transform their career

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Complete solution for teams and companies

changePlan.question: Can I change plans at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan whenever you want. Changes will apply on your next billing cycle.

refund.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us and we'll refund your money.

updates.question: Do prices include updates?
updates.answer: Yes, all plans include automatic content updates and new features at no additional cost.

cta.title: Not sure which plan to choose?
cta.description: Our team will help you find the perfect solution for your needs.

legal.title: Legal Terms
legal.subtitle: Legal information and policies for Outliers Academy

content.intro: Welcome to Outliers Academy. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: Outliers Academy is an online educational platform that offers technology courses, including but not limited to programming, artificial intelligence, data science, and web development.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To access certain services, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All course content, including videos, texts, images, and materials, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights. You may not copy, distribute, or modify this content without authorization.

payment.title: 5. Payments and Refunds
payment.content: Payments must be made through the methods specified on the platform. We offer refunds within 30 days of purchase, subject to our refund policies.

content.intro: At Outliers Academy, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, enroll in a course, or communicate with us. We also automatically collect information about your use of our services.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or transfer your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances.

content.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website.

what.title: 1. What are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience.

types.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality, performance cookies to analyze usage, and functionality cookies to remember your preferences.

control.title: 3. Cookie Control
control.content: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. However, this may affect the functionality of our website.

contact.title: Legal Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about these legal terms, you can contact us:
